backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining types and in‑memory maps for notices, events, gallery items, memberships, payments, contacts, and user profiles with admin authorization logic and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved files, components, and test IDs for notice/event mutation hooks and admin edit UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts and mounting the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router route tree and renders all application pages within the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Authentication control handling Internet Identity login/logout and triggering React Query cache resets and admin check invalidation.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via a query hook, and displays success or error alerts.
frontend/src/components/forms/Membership: Provides a membership registration form with validation, submission to backend, and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Creates a modal lightbox for viewing gallery images with navigation buttons and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ImageWit: Renders an image component that swaps to a fallback URL if loading the primary source fails.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays payment option cards for maintenance fees and welfare contributions with placeholder buttons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying association info, navigation links, contact details, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, conditional admin link, mobile menu, and authentication controls with admin check error indicator.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, notices, events, and gallery CRUD operations using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines custom NCRL color variables and utility classes for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/adminLinks.ts: Provides helpers to normalize admin tab names and generate admin navigation URLs.
frontend/src/lib/events.ts: Maps event types to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/gallery.ts: Utilities for validating, normalizing, sorting, and providing fallback gallery items.
frontend/src/lib/notices.ts: Maps notice categories to descriptive labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, committee info, and styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with authentication, tab navigation, profile setup, and CRUD interactions via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information with loading skeletons and a contact form, using fetched data or fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Shows upcoming and past events, handles loading and errors, and conditionally displays admin controls.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays a gallery grid with admin controls, skeletons, error states, and a lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring hero section, quick links, previews for notices, events, gallery, and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPaymentsPag: Renders membership registration and payment sections within card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Lists notices with category filtering, admin options, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Utility that converts backend error messages into user-friendly text based on common patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, admin-gated feature requirements, known issues, and pending update requests.
